title: Rotation List?
body: Does anyone know if there is a rotation schedule, or at least a Game Mode Rotation list somewhere so people can keep track and prepare for upcoming game modes?

replies.body: A new announcement page is usually created to list out the upcoming rotating game modes.  The current schedule can be found in this [rotating game mode queue](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-16) announcement.  8/26 to 8/29 (that's this weekend!) will be Twisted Treeline: Hexakill.  The weekend after that will be Nexus Siege.  Hope that helps!
